ValidationRule.description: The Current Step field can only be set to Audit/Review Complete if the Current Review status is a specific value.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ($RecordType.Name = "Credit Risk Audit Reference" ), ( ISPICKVAL(Current_Step__c, 'Audit/Review Complete') ), ( ISPICKVAL(Current_Review_Status__c, 'Requires Review') ), ($Profile.Name <>"System Administrator") )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: The Current Step field can only be set to Audit/Review Complete if the Current Review status is one of the following values: Decline, Approve with ACH or one of the Approve with Condition â€“ *** values
